mapper.insert: insert into board_image(photono, photopath, filename, type) values(#{photoNo}, #{photoPath}, #{fileName}, #{type})
insert into board_file(fileno, filepath, filename, type) values(#{fileNo}, #{filePath}, #{fileName}, #{type})
insert into board(idx, nick, email, title, content, post_date, b_view, category) values (#{boardNo}, #{name}, #{email}, #{title}, #{content}, sysdate(), 0, #{category})
